communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Lecture tone; pseudo-scientific framing; frame women as objects with market value.

narratives.c_essay: Women are commodities in the dating market, and their value is determined by their physical attractiveness and youth. Men must improve themselves to increase their market value and attract high-quality women.
narratives.p_intro: Welcome to my channel, where I dispense wisdom on the dating market and male self-improvement. If you're tired of being a beta male and want to become a high-value man, you're in the right place.
